main event: A luminous, round shaped object was observed in the sky for 7 or 8 minutes in Delray Beach.
interesting points: The object was described as very unsteady in motion, appearing to dance or whirl intermittently., The object was seen by the observer's father., There was a smaller object that seemed to accompany the larger one., The sighting included a discussion of weather conditions including wind and temperature., The object eventually disappeared at a high rate of speed over the ocean.
